title: Athens Riviera plus Saronic Stitches
blurb: Coastal promenades plus island paths and marble ruins.
failBlurb: Coastal promenades plus island paths and marble ruins. Coastal winds, endless pavement, crumbling ruins.

title: Camino Portugués Coastal Sampler
blurb: Atlantic boardwalks, fishing towns, pilgrim vibes.
failBlurb: Atlantic boardwalks, fishing towns, pilgrim vibes. Exposed boardwalks, tourist towns, weary pilgrims.

title: Kyoto to Koyasan Pilgrim Mix
blurb: Temples, cedar paths, mountain monastery finish.
failBlurb: Temples, cedar paths, mountain monastery finish. Steep temple stairs, dark forests, exhausting climbs.

title: Cape Town Coastal plus Winelands
failBlurb: Sea cliffs, fynbos, vineyard ridges. Harsh cliffs, thorny fynbos, draining vineyard slopes.

title: Patagonia Lakes District Link
blurb: Forested lakes, hanging glaciers, wood bridges.
failBlurb: Forested lakes, hanging glaciers, wood bridges. Mosquito lakes, unstable glaciers, slick bridges.

title: Iceland South Coast Waterfalls
blurb: Skógafoss to black sand, lava fields, sea stacks.
failBlurb: Skógafoss to black sand, lava fields, sea stacks. Cold spray, endless black sand, sharp lava fields.

title: Scottish Lochs & Glens Chain
blurb: Glen paths, moor crossings, lochside lanes.
failBlurb: Glen paths, moor crossings, lochside lanes. Muddy glens, bleak moors, biting loch winds.

title: Rocky Mountain Front Range
blurb: Pine, granite, alpine lakes, thin-air views.
failBlurb: Pine, granite, alpine lakes, thin-air views. Thin air, harsh granite, freezing alpine lakes.

title: Canterbury & Southern Alps Mix
blurb: River flats to tussock passes and swing bridges.
failBlurb: River flats to tussock passes and swing bridges. Flooded flats, endless tussock, swaying bridges.

title: Jordan Desert Approaches plus Petra
failBlurb: Canyons, dunes, and Nabatean stonework. Blistering canyons, choking dust, crumbling stone.

title: Norway Fjord Village Chain
failBlurb: Ferries, farms, fjord-balcony trails. Swaying ferries, monotonous farms, crowded fjords.

title: Vietnam Northern Terraces Circuit
blurb: Rice terraces, ridgeline hamlets, cloud seas.
failBlurb: Rice terraces, ridgeline hamlets, cloud seas. Steep terraces, isolated hamlets, suffocating mists.
